com.aventstack.extentreports

Interface ReportAggregatesListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExtentReporter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractReporter, BasicFileReporter, ExtentHtmlReporter, ExtentXReporter

    public interface ReportAggregatesListener
    Allows sharing of aggregates/collections to be shared with the started reporter. A few examples of these collections include:
    • Category context - list of all categories and associated tests
    • Exception context - list of all exceptions and associated tests
    • Complete list of started tests
    • System information

    • Method Summary

      Allows sharing the complete list of exceptions and associated tests with the reporter
      void setStatusCount(SessionStatusStats sc)
      Passes the stats of the run session for all possible levels: Features/Tests Scenarios/Logs Steps

      Passes all system information to the reporter

      Allows sharing the complete list of tests with the reporter
      void setTestRunnerLogs(java.util.List<java.lang.String> logs)
      Passes the complete list of logs to the reporter

      • setStatusCount

        void setStatusCount(SessionStatusStats sc)
        Passes the stats of the run session for all possible levels:
        • Features/Tests
        • Scenarios/Logs
        • Steps
        Parameters:
        sc - SessionStatusStats represents stats of each hierarchical level of test/event
